participant_1.background:
I was a chef, but I recently lost my job.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.
1984 is my favorite book.
I love the energy of the bar on Halloween.
I started my own business and now work from home, which allows me to take my morning walks to the beach more often.

participant_2.background:
I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic.
i just bought my first home.
i love my job.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
It is going great! I just got home from work and am getting ready to head out to a party.
That sounds like fun! I am just hanging out at home. I recently lost my job as a chef so I have been starting my own business.
Oh no! I am sorry to hear that. But it sounds like you are on the right track with starting your own business. What kind of business are you starting?
I am starting a catering business. I have been working on recipes and building a menu. I am really excited about it.
That is awesome! I love to cook. I am sure you will be very successful.
So what are you doing for fun this weekend?
I am not sure yet. I might go to the beach or just stay in and relax.
The beach sounds nice. I am going to play at a local music festival with my band.
That sounds like fun! I love music festivals.
Me too! It is always a good time.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you.
It was nice talking to you too! Have a great weekend!
